content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal preferences, but I can some insights on which one could be the easiest to start with. If you're new to the self-love concept, "The Gifts of Imperfection" by Brené Brown might be a good starting point as it provides a comprehensive introduction to the topic and is easy to understand. The book is also highly accessible to many readers because the author is a renowned researcher on shame, vulnerability, and courage. The book is packed with actionable advice and personal anecdotes, which make the reading experience inspiring and memorable.
